cc26xx ANATOP_MMAP

This document presents a summary of the hardware interface for the ANATOP_MMAP interface on cc26xx product.

Each module instance within the design is shown below.

Click on each module instance to get to the detailed memory map.

cc26xx Instance Summary

The table below shows the base address and address space for this memorymap.

Module Name

Base Address

Size

ADI_0_RF

0x00000000

32 B

ADI_1_SYNTH

0x10000000

16 B

ADI_2_REFSYS

0x40086000

16 B

ADI_3_REFSYS

0x40086200

16 B

DDI_0_OSC

0x400CA000

64 B

ADI_4_AUX

0x400CB000

16 B
